tool_description: 100x cheaper than Google Translate. Same API. Same quality.
title: Deep Translate

api_list.name: detect
api_list.description: To detect the language of some text, make a POST request and provide the appropriate request body.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deep-translate1.p.rapidapi.com/language/translate/v2/detect"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deep-translate1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: languages
api_list.description: You can discover the supported languages of this API by sending an HTTP request using a URL of the following format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deep-translate1.p.rapidapi.com/language/translate/v2/languages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deep-translate1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: To translate text, make a POST request and provide JSON in the request body that identifies the language to translate to (target) and the text to translate (q). You can provide multiple segments of text to translate by including multiple q fields or a list of values for the q field. Specify target languages by using their ISO-639-1 codes.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: detect
api_list.description: To detect the language of some text, make a POST request and provide the appropriate request body.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deep-translate1.p.rapidapi.com/language/translate/v2/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deep-translate1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
